class FastRelease[source]

FastRelease(owner=None, repo=None, token=None, **groups)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
rel = FastRelease(breaking="Breaking Changes", enhancement="New Features", bug="Bugs Squashed")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
l = rel.latest_release()
l

'1.0.10'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
cfg,cfg_path = _config()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ver = cfg['version']
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
subprocess.run(['git', 'tag', ver], capture_output=True)

CompletedProcess(args=['git', 'tag', '1.0.11'], returncode=0, stdout=b'', stderr=b'')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
subprocess.run(['git', 'push', '--tags'], capture_output=True)

CompletedProcess(args=['git', 'push', '--tags'], returncode=0, stdout=b'', stderr=b'To github.com:fastai/nbdev.git\n * [new tag]         1.0.11 -> 1.0.11\n')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
subprocess.run(['git', 'pull', '--tags'], capture_output=True)

CompletedProcess(args=['git', 'pull', '--tags'], returncode=0, stdout=b'Created autostash: 37f4c01\nHEAD is now at d69f3d8 remove Config\nCurrent branch master is up to date.\n', stderr=b'Applied autostash.\n')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
echo "$$(python setup.py version)"
echo "$${TAG}"
git tag "$${TAG}"
git push --tags
gh api repos/:owner/:repo/releases -F tag_name="$${TAG}" -F name="$${TAG}"
{% endraw %}

To create a markdown changelog, first create a FastRelease object, passing a mapping from GitHub labels to markdown titles. Put your github token in a file named token at the root of your repo.

{% raw %}

FastRelease.changelog[source]

FastRelease.changelog(debug=False)

Create the CHANGELOG.md file, or return the proposed text if debug is True

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# print(rel.changelog(debug=True))
{% endraw %}

Utility methods

FastRelease.latest_release[source]

FastRelease.latest_release()

Tag for the latest release

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

FastRelease.gh[source]

FastRelease.gh(path, complete=False)

Call GitHub API path
